verses.verse: Great <S%H1419><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised, <S%H1984><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in elevation, <S%H5131><s%> the joy <S%H4885><s%> of the whole earth, <S%H776><s%> is Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> sides, <S%H3411><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> King. <S%H4428><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> has shown <S%H3045><s%> himself in her citadels <S%H759><s%> as a refuge. <S%H4869><s%>
For, <S%H4428><s%> behold, the kings assembled <S%H3259><s%> themselves, <S%H5674><s%> they passed by together. <S%H3162><s%>
They saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H8539><s%> then they were amazed. They were dismayed. <S%H926><s%> They hurried away. <S%H2648><s%>
Trembling <S%H7461><s%> took hold <S%H270><s%> of them there, <S%H2427><s%> pain, as of a woman in travail. <S%H3205><s%>
With the east <S%H6921><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> you break <S%H7665><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish. <S%H8659><s%>

As we have heard, <S%H8085><s%> so we have seen, <S%H7200><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> it forever. <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5704><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
We have thought <S%H1819><s%> about your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your temple. <S%H1964><s%>

As is your name, <S%H8034><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> so is your praise <S%H8416><s%> to the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Your right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>
Let Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> be glad! <S%H1523><s%> Let the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> Because of your judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
Walk about <S%H5437><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and go around <S%H5362><s%> her. <S%H5608><s%> Number its towers. <S%H4026><s%>

Mark <S%H7896><s%> well <S%H3820><s%> her bulwarks. <S%H2430><s%> Consider <S%H6448><s%> her palaces, <S%H759><s%> that you may tell <S%H5608><s%> it to the next <S%H314><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>
For this God <S%H430><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%> He will be our guide <S%H5090><s%> even to death. <S%H4192><s%>
